metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4219 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick. The vulnerability occurs due to improper use of open functions and leads to a denial of service. This flaw allows an attacker to crash the system.

notes.Note: eslerm> focal required cad7b3, 1c1f602, b51ead0, and ff02d9b as pre-patches and upstream patch did not resolve hang

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
